extendedInfo.description: The new and improved version of our popular Daily Bible Devotional:* Customizable notifications* No Ads* Change text size* Delete and save devotionals* Write and read comments* Quickly swipe between devotions* Settings to change refresh frequency* Same devotionals* Facebook integrationShare this with others even those who aren't saved or church goers. Each day a new devotional will be delivered to the app. Enjoy and God bless!  A great way to receive your daily bread. Remember, you will also get a life application for each bible verse and scripture.* A new bible devotional is delivered to your app each day.* Each devotional comes with a way to apply it to your life.* Share any devotional with your friends and family.* Save your favorite devotionals to read later or to reference.Get a daily Bible verse with a devotional that applies to your daily life.  Daily Bible Devotion+ gives you daily devotionals and bible verses that are inspirational, easy to understand and grows your relationship with God.

reviews.title: Update please
reviews.comment: I have to clear data every day to get the PM devotion from the night before and then have to get rid of the \"old\" ones. Otherwise great ap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This would be a lovely app, but unfortunately the updates don\'t seem to work. Get the AM devotions most of the time but the PM ones never arrive,  which is a big shame as the devotions are good. Has the dev abandoned the app?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid delivery problem
reviews.comment: Delivers AM devos every day.  PMs never arrive, which is really too bad since the content is wonderful.  And two per day are promised by the author.  Hope this gets fixed soon.  Have been trying for over two months now!!!  Please fix this!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Great app if it would update! Only get one of the two daily devotionals.  Fix this and get 5 stars. Galaxy nexus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RAZR Maxx
reviews.comment: Won\'t update correctly. Doesn\'t always give am and pm devotions. Other than that really enjoy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Paid for this, and am so disappointed. Devotions don\'t arrive, are late, skips days. I want my money back! That\'s not right that this person is preying on Christians...
reviews.author: Mike Reynolds

reviews.title: Inspiring
reviews.comment: Only getting 2 stars as I just got this. I love the concept and the devotionals are so heart felt and inpiring, makes one think. However can it be made so that we the,user can set the reminder time or at least give more options? Ex...6am and 8pm. I usually ended up reading the day befores pm with the day of am.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This brother in Christ is just taking peoples hard earned money without sending out the devotions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Comments
reviews.comment: Was disappointed that the comments was not a place to make personal comments or notes.  Comments are for social networks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Just wish the arrival of daily devotions was more timely. Get the morning one during middle of afternoon & pm one late @ night. Be good to be able to specify times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The free app works better
reviews.comment: When sharing content the free app sends the content this one sends a link to their Facebook site? The free app is petty good with notifications and this app doesn\'t notify.  Wish they would have just removed the ads on the free app when I purchased as I had a lot of favorites that didn\'t show up on this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unfortunately
reviews.comment: I think this app has been abandoned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect reading daily
reviews.comment: I have found that each days devotional has been perfect for what I needed that day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite app
reviews.comment: This is my favorite app so far that I\'ve downloaded.  It is functional, has a great message and lots of upgrades from the free app.  I can change the font size! :-)  And the reminders work well.  It even has a section for me to control the settings.  Now I have a great little ringtone to let me know when a new one comes in, its music to my ears.
reviews.author: A Google User
